plot: Brilliant cryogenics expert Dr. Victor Fries is transformed into Mr. Freeze, a vengeful creature who can only survive in subzero temperatures.

Batman must stop Mr. Freeze, an ice themed villain who has a grudge on Ferris Boyle the CEO of Goth Corp. Batman soon learns the tragic story about Mr. Freeze, his real name is revealed to be Victor Fries who was a brilliant scientist and he has secretly used the company's funding in hopes of saving his wife Nora from a terminal illness. Boyle tries to shut down Victor's project, but it doesn't go as planned when Victor is turned into Mr. Freeze and Boyle leaves his former employee and Nora for dead. Mr. Freeze reveals to Batman that he plans on ruining Boyle's banquet party as revenge for not letting him save his wife. During an ensuing fight with the ice villain, Batman becomes sympathetic over Victor's plight and he hands over a video tape of Boyle's misdeeds to a news reporter. Batman leaves the party and he sarcastically says goodbye to Boyle. Mr. Freeze is soon taken to prison and he sadly looks at his snow globe of Nora, causing Batman to look on in pity.—dawsonpersi
